root.name: Gourmania
root.description:
Slice and dice your way to the top in a city-wide showdown!
Do you have the skills to win a cook off among the top chefs at a glamorous resort ? Begin your journey at a fast food joint, finding the ingredients for the sandwiches your customers want and the processing of their orders before time runs out. Before the big showdown, you'll save a Sushi Bar, a Pizza Parlour and more from shutting down, making you the most sought after chef in town! Just make sure to purchase the upgrades that will give you an edge. Full of seek-and-find and slice-and-dice fun, Gourmania is your ticket to the big leagues!
